Sections.Text: The museum's patrons flee in terror as the long-separated souls of two ancient lovers meet again for the first time in 3000 years.
Ses-kalla's quest has lasted uncounted lifetimes and left twenty-score victims in its wake, but now it is over.
Nuratum, blessed of Isis, is returned, and together the two wizened ancient ones can seize the power and glory that the King of Ur once denied them.
The treasures of Tyree Manse will take a lifetime to spend, but they have much longer than that to revenge themselves on the world.
